title: India needs Rs 30 lakh cr investment for 500 GW renewables by 2030
description: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi announced that Rs 30 lakh crore is needed to achieve India's target of 500 GW renewable energy by 2030. Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate the 4th RE-INVEST 2024 summit in Gandhinagar, focusing on future trends and technologies in renewable energy.
